definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 165:b, 1. I: del. ‘2Ki 15:29, ’ and ll. 5, b 6.—[[[גִּלּוּל]]]. Vid. Baud:ZMG, 1904, 395 ff. (cps. BAram. [[גְּלָל]] ([[אֶבֶן]]), Palm. [[גללא]]:Tariff i. 9 = sth/lh liqinh; and concludes that it was orig. a designation of the primitive stone menhir or [[מַצֵּבָה]]).
